_header: Holy Mother that bore Christ buyer of mankind
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: William Herebert, ‘Alma redemptoris mater’ — eleven lines

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Holy moder þat bere cryst buggere of monkundeþou art ȝat of heuene blisse þat prest wey ȝyfte and bunde…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Of gabrieles mouþe þou uonge þylke AueLesne ous sunne nouþe so wee bisecheth þe
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written in left margin beside first line, f. 207v)
